column4: Need help for enabling Ubuntu 10 Visual effects... it was working on 9
Need help in enabling Ubuntu 10 Visual effects... it was working on 9
visual effects was working in ubuntu 9
what video card
but now it says no drivers available for video driver or something like that
i think i have a ATI Radion
how can i check in my ubuntu
you need either the open source ati or fglrx driver
let me do it real quick ,thanks
type lsmod | grep radeon
here it is
and if nothing shows up tye lsmod | grep fglrx
ATI Technologies Inc M22 [Mobility Radeon X300]
i dont think that fglrx supports that
:( everything was working fine in ubuntu 9.10
i have upgraded it today
just few hours ago
type lsmod | grep fglrx
to see if your running fglrx
nothing shows up on that
I'm pretty sure that fglrx doesn't support the x300
